description:
Ma Renka is Ma Kensei`s daughter. She came to Japan in search of her father, who she planned to take back to China. She falls in love with Ken`ichi. In chapter 313, she transferred to Ken`ichi`s school.
She is able to perceive martial techniques at a level unusual for non-Master-class martial artists. In chapters 309-312, during the fight between Apachai and Kei Retsumin, she was able to read most of the shockwave orbits that surrounded the two combatants and guide Ken`ichi through them.
name: Ma Renka
